rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {2224, 3806, 4423, 4436, B2007}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MKB1200} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Unit was previously coded {MKB2420, MKF2121, MKW2420}

description: Marketing research provides students with a broad understanding of the entire marketing research process. This includes understanding the marketing research decision process, research design, sampling, data collection, data analysis and how to prepare a marketing research proposal and report.
